name: NATIONAL ALLIANCE OF FOREST OWNERS
description: Protect and enhance privately owned forests
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to forest biomass and carbon included in the FY 2018 Department of the Interior, Environment, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act (H.R. 3354) and the Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2018 (H.R. 1625/Public Law 115-141).

Issues related to forest biomass and energy.

Issues related to the Endangered Species Act.
